thread.title: Vince McMahon Reportedly Uninjured After Being Involved in Car Accident
thread.title_full: Vince McMahon Reportedly Uninjured After Being Involved in Car Accident

author: Joseph Zucker
title: Vince McMahon Reportedly Uninjured After Being Involved in Car Accident
text: Vince McMahon Reportedly Uninjured After Being Involved in Car Accident Michael N. Todaro/Getty Images Featured Columnist March 21, 2017 WWE chairman Vince McMahon was unhurt following a car accident Tuesday, TMZ Sports reported. TMZ Sports spoke to law enforcement sources who confirmed McMahon was driving a black Bentley and that another vehicle was involved in the crash. Authorities were unable to discern the cause of the accident, which a source told TMZ Sports was "minor" and that "everyone is OK." While McMahon remains in charge of WWE, his appearances on WWE programming have become fewer and farther between. The 71-year-old last showed up at Payback last May to announce his daughter, Stephanie, would take over as commissioner of Raw, and his son, Shane, would be in charge of SmackDown Live. Like the new article format? !
